insights-agent.name: Content Insights Agent
insights-agent.description: Analyzes content engagement metrics to highlight optimization opportunities.

report-generator-agent.name: Report Generator
report-generator-agent.description: Compiles outputs from all agents into a structured Markdown summary for clients.

website-scanner-agent.name: Website Scanner Agent
website-scanner-agent.description: Fetches a website URL and extracts metadata, heading tags, Open Graph tags, and link structure.
